mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY INDATE ASC) RNUM, R_IDX, B_IDX, G_IDX, U_ID, CONT, INDATE FROM REPLY WHERE B_IDX = ${b_idx} ORDER BY INDATE ASC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ${pageNum} AND ${contentNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(R_IDX ,CONT, B_IDX, U_ID, G_IDX) VALUES(( SELECT NVL(MAX(R_IDX),0)+1 FROM REPLY ),'${cont}', ${b_idx}, '${u_id}', ${g_idx})
